thread.title: Steve tonks
thread.title_full: Glasses Direct reviewed by Steve tonks

author: Steve tonks
title: Steve tonks
text: Firstly the price and special offer.. 2 pairs for £19.. I dont make much fuss over glasses and hate to be ripped off. I chose two pairs from the £49 price range to qualify for 2 for £19 deal. The buying was simple, communications were good, emails to keep me informed. First pair arrived and was more than happy.. Only a week before I had been to boots who looked at my old pair and said i had "flexi" arms, these would be extra and not offered on their cheap ranges.. Glasses direct WERE flexi, so a bonus. Second pair came and these were also flexi and as good as first. I cant fault the quality or service.
